EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmed: GoDirect Users Conference in Philadelphia, May 10, 2017
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}},
Your registration has been confirmed for GoDirect Users Conference in Philadelphia. Please save this email for future reference.
Event: GoDirect Users Conference Date: Wednesday, May 10, 2017 Location: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Philadelphia Airport 4509 Island Avenue, Philadelphia, PA 19153
We will be in touch with more details. We look forward to meeting you at the conference.
Sincerely,
Honeywell GoDirect Team godirect@honeywell.com <[[mailto:godirect@honeywell.com]]>
